org.apache.flink.runtime.io.disk

类 SpillingBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.memory.AbstractPagedOutputView
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.disk.SpillingBuffer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.DataOutput, DataOutputView

    public class SpillingBuffer
extends AbstractPagedOutputView
    An output view that buffers written data in memory pages and spills them when they are full.

    • 字段概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • nextSegment

        protected MemorySegment nextSegment(MemorySegment current,
                                    int positionInCurrent)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: AbstractPagedOutputView
        This method must return a segment. If no more segments are available, it must throw an EOFException.
        指定者:
        nextSegment 在类中 AbstractPagedOutputView
        参数:
        current - The current memory segment
        positionInCurrent - The position in the segment, one after the last valid byte.
        返回:
        The next memory segment.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • flip

        public DataInputView flip()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • close

        public java.util.List<MemorySegment> close()
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        返回:
        A list with all memory segments that have been taken from the memory segment source.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • moveAll

        private static final <E> void moveAll(java.util.ArrayList<E> source,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<E> target)
        Utility method that moves elements. It avoids copying the data into a dedicated array first, as the ArrayList.addAll(java.util.Collection) method does.
        类型参数:
        E -
        参数:
        source -
        target -
